p.span: Add Heart rate module to weighting system
Send 'amber' alerts to cellular users who are nearby the missing child
An estimated 1.2 million children are kidnapped every year
Exploited for child labor, beggar, sex worker and put up for illegal adoption
Lokidor is designed to quickly identify victims of children trafficking, alerting parents of suspicious activity using cellular location data.
Time point and length of disappearance
Distance outside of the allowable zone
Distance between missing point and hotsopt
Weighting System(the severity of the alert ):
Children’s locations are secret until the first alert is sent
